title: (x) Art Nouveau Typeface - Art Gothic {Frank}
content:
Might anyone out there have an idea if anything as subtle and chic as this beautiful modern-looking art nouveau typeface exists out there in the commercial font market? Any suggestions welcome. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sample-type.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20141130150318/http:/typophile.com/files/sample-type.gif) | 65.25 KB |
author: Elton

comments.content:
Bingo! That's the one. Excellent. Thanks ever so much!  
Elton
P22's Art Nouveau and Dard Hunter
